name: ORAL HEALTH AMERICA
description: National organization educating about importance of oral health to overall well-being
sampleDescriptions:
Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP) Support a five-year extension through to fiscal year 2022. 

H.R.1749, VET CARE Act of 2017. Support.

H.R.3759/S.1028, RAISE Family Caregivers Act. Support.
FY19 budget/appropriations - oppose administration's proposed elimination of Oral Health Training and Workforce Programs at HRSA at HHS.

Need to fill the Chief Dental Officer vacancy at CMS. (no bill)

General discussion of oral health's importance to one's overall, systemic health and well-being.

General discussion of the oral health

FY19 Labor-HHS-Education and Related Agencies appropriations - oppose administration's proposed elimination of Oral Health Training and Workforce Programs at HRSA at HHS and restore to at least FY2018

Need to fill the Chief Dental Officer vacancy at CMS. (no bill)

General discussion of oral health's importance to one's overall, systemic health and well-being.
